links.title: Trade of the Day: Tesla Motors Inc (TSLA) Still Trending Down
links.description: Sam Collins, InvestorPlace Chief Technical Analyst Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ:) - This designer, manufacturer and developer of electric vehicles has had a rough time bringing in a profit from its highly engineered line of products. On Wednesday, the company is expected to report third-quarter earnings, with gains for the first time in nearly two years.

links.title: Mike Khouw's Put Fly Trade In Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA)
links.description: On CNBC's Options Action, Mike Khouw suggested an options strategy in Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA). He said that the stock has been in a decline in 2016 and he added its chart looks like the stock is in a downtrend. He thinks that it is going to trade lower and he expects it to drop to $170.

links.title: Goodbye, Project Titan: Apple's Car Ambitions Fade
links.description: In early 2015, as Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) was basking in the massive success of the iPhone 6, investors started to learn about the next market Apple planned to disrupt: the car. Details began to leak out about "Project Titan," an Apple product development team that was working on an electric -- and possibly autonomous -- car to rival Tesla Motors '(NASDAQ: TSLA) vehicles.

messages.body: $TSLA Elon Musk (SpaceX) details his vision of life on Mars MW 10-23 http://on.mktw.net/2dBwCep

links.title: Elon Musk details his vision of life on Mars
links.description: Space X founder and CEO Elon Musk gave more details about plans to colonize Mars on Sunday during an AMA session on Reddit. Musk's ambitious plans, laid out last month at an international space conference in Mexico, include using reusable rockets to launch a fleet of spaceships to establish a base on the Red Plant, creating a colony with 1 million people over the course of 100 years.

links.title: Tesla Motors (Nasdaq:TSLA) - Fundamentals Analysis
links.description: CEO CEO Bio Mr. Elon R. Musk founded Space Exploration Technologies Corporation in June 2002 and serves as its Chief Executive Officer, Chief Rocket Designer, and Chief Technology Officer. Mr. Musk is a Co-Founder of Tesla Motors, Inc. and has been its Chief Executive Officer since October 2008 and serves its Product Architect.
